titles.title: Commending Lithuania for refusing to ratify the European Union's Political Dialogue and Cooperation Agreement with Cuba.
Commending Lithuania for refusing to ratify the European Union's Political Dialogue and Cooperation Agreement with Cuba.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Energy, the Environment and Cyber.

bill.summary: This resolution strongly commends Lithuania for refusing to ratify the Political Dialogue and Cooperation Agreement between the European Union (EU) and Cuba. It also calls on other EU members to follow Lithuania's footsteps and annul their ratification of the agreement.
